def rev(n):
    r=0
    while(n!=0):
        r=r*10+n%10
        n=n/10
    return r
def main():
    t=int(raw_input())
    while t:
        ans=0
        n=int(raw_input())
        while t:
            p=rev(n)
            if(p==n):
                break
            else:
                ans=ans+1
                n=n+p
        print str(ans)+" "+str(p)
        t=t-1
main()
